Methods code
_initdescriptionprevnextTop
sub _init {
    my $self = shift;
    my $file = $self->{file};
    carp("Unable to open [$file]\n") if $file and ! -f $file;
    $file ||= 'config';

    $self->{config} = {};
    if(open(IN, "<$file")) {
        while(<IN>) {
  	    chomp;
	    next unless my ($k, $v) = /^\s*([\w_]+)\s*=\s*(.*)$/;
	    $self->{config}->{$k} = $v;
        }
        close(IN);
    }
}
directorydescriptionprevnextTop
sub directory {
    my $self = shift;
    my ($param, $create) = @_;

    my $value = $self->{config}->{$param};
    $value = lc($1) if !$value and $param =~ /^([\w+_]+?)(_DIR)$/i;

    my $base = $self->{base} || File::Spec->curdir();
    my $dir  = File::Spec->rel2abs($value, $base);

    mkdir($dir) if $create and ! -d $dir;
    return $dir;
}
newdescriptionprevnextTop
sub new {
    my $that = shift;
    $that = ref($that) || $that;

    my $self = bless { @_ }, $that;
    $self->_init();
    return $self;
}
optiondescriptionprevnextTop
sub option {
    my $self = shift;
    my ($param) = @_;

    return $self->{config}->{$param};
}
